channel.title: math.SG updates on arXiv.org
channel.description: math.SG updates on the arXiv.org e-print archive.

item.title: Moduli spaces of spacefilling branes in symplectic 4-manifolds
item.description: arXiv:2501.07926v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: On a symplectic manifold $(M, \omega)$, a spacefilling brane structure is a closed 2-form $F$ which determines a complex structure, with respect to which $F +i\omega$ is holomorphic symplectic. For holomorphic symplectic compact K\"ahler 4-manifolds, we show that the moduli space of spacefilling branes is smooth, and determine its dimension. The proof relies on the local Torelli theorem for K3 surfaces and tori.
item.dc:creator: Charlotte Kirchhoff-Lukat, Marco Zambon
